Paragraph: Also , BCNU administration increased serum tumor necrosis factor - alpha ( TNFalpha ) , hippocampal MT and malondialdehyde ( MDA ) contents as well as caspase - 3 activity in addition to histological alterations .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Tumor |

The paragraph mentions "BCNU administration increased serum tumor necrosis factor - alpha (TNFalpha)". Here, "tumor" is the underlying disease condition that is being treated with BCNU (Carmustine), an anticancer drug.

| TNFalpha-related inflammation (implied) |

Here, "tumor" is the underlying disease condition that is being treated with BCNU (Carmustine), an anticancer drug. The paragraph also implies that an inflammatory response, possibly related to TNFalpha, may be occurring as a result of the treatment.
